title: Great, but metronome is way too quiet
comment: This has all the tools you need, bit even on the highest seeing with good speakers, the metronome is way too quiet. Maximum volume is more like a good minimum volume.

This is the only decent drone app or even video that I have ever found the ability to use the metronome and drone at the same time is incredible. Also the option to add the fifth or even other drone tones is amazing

title: Great app
comment: I use this app multiple times each day for practicing and teaching. The drone feature is wonderful!
Tuner doesn't work

title: Awesomeness
comment: Very great! !!!!
Alright, quite simple.
The metronome not being accurate problem was solved in version 2.0, which was released after this comment.

title: Great App and FOSS? Wow.
comment: Found it on F-Droid. Would be better and would get 5 stars if it would include drone pitches in guitar tuning range.  Great App!

title: Great app
comment: I really like this app. Great ideas, but the tuner doesn't work on my phone. If the tuner worked, it would be 5 stars all the way.

title: Love it!
comment: I use it all the time :-)

title: Lol
comment: Hise

title: Give us the option to do drones in different octaves +/-
comment: Will be 5 stars with octave control. Thanks
BRILLIANT app. Very fluid, easy to set up in no time.
Nice

title: Not impressed
comment: The tuner is too slow, it is hard to accurately tune to it.

title: Really like this app
comment: I really like this app, easy to use, having all the tools I need to practice in own pace is extremely handy.  The only improvement I can see its for the drone, it would be cool to have the octaves option, so it plays the same note also an octave down.

title: Tuner won't work on Galaxy S3
comment: Recent download.  Tuner says "calculating" but hangs and won't come on...?
Wonderful, really useful, high quality product!

title: If you practice, get this app.
comment: I never rate apps, but I was so inspired after using this one, I had to let everyone know what a fantastic app this is for every musician!

title: Bad
comment: I tried using this but the tune wouldst work

title: Great!
comment: The combo is great, especially for a free app. I like the fact that you can drone chords; I might use this for composing on the fly. The metronome does glitch occasionally though.
This is great

title: Pretty Nice! Looking forward to even better updates.
comment: It'd be great if the tuning A is in A4 not an octave below. After all, most musicians tune w/ concert A4. And hv 440-442hz even 415 for baroque tuning

title: Awesome!
comment: It's great to have a tuner, metronome, and drone that can work simultaneously! No part is that impressive, but the package is great.

title: Nice!
comment: Nice little tool. Good job. It would be nice to have it be a little more instrument specific but no biggie still a nice app.
